summary: This tutorial covers UTF-8 Emoji Transport concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use UTF-8 Emoji Transport effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of UTF-8 Emoji Transport and how to apply it in your projects.
